channel.title: Checkpoint Midnight: Shades of Gray (series) (PLAYTEST)
channel.description:
![What's Your Fetish !|373x500](upload://bplCwtSa1g3zCL9cUplRWRjLHzk.jpeg)
*****For the first 24 hours, please only sign up if you joined the Gauntlet Community in the last 6 months, or if you've had a hard time getting into games.*****
**Please only sign up for this game if you're interested in playtesting a game in development!**
The Allied Powers carved up Austria after the Second World War. Now the storied city of Vienna is officially divided into zones administered by the Soviets, the Americans, the French, and the British. But the true lines of the city run deeper, written in magic and blood. You know what strange things lurk in the city’s shadows—because you’re one of them.
You are freelance operatives in a city marked by war and division. You are secret supernatural beings in a world of danger and espionage. You are spies in Cold War Vienna, and this is a story of you pulling off high-stakes missions and juggling conflicting loyalties.
**CW: supernatural horror, post-war trauma and aftermath, romance, possible betrayal**
**System** : Checkpoint Midnight by [Cloven Pine Games](https://cloven-pine-games.itch.io/)! Powered by the Apocalypse. Rules will be taught in play.
**Duration** : Four 3 hour sessions
**Breaks** : 2 breaks per session (5-10 mins)
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : Yes, but only if all players consent to recording and publishing
**Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required **.**
**Safety** : Lines & Veils, Script Change, an open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.
**Open access** : Public signs up are available at 3/18/2021 10PM (Manila Time)
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gauntlet-rpg.com%2Fcommunity-code-of-conduct.html&v=3).
**Session 1**: [date=2021-05-07 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MVpyarCikgPSAWYXZPY **Session 2**: [date=2021-05-14 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MVpz2BTC8DtyPHlEmZ4 **Session 3**: [date=2021-05-21 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MVpzCPIxsF4m17t4CpG **Session 4**: [date=2021-05-28 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MVpzK4IQNTetW71PysB

item.title: Checkpoint Midnight: Shades of Gray (series) (PLAYTEST)
item.dc:creator: @swordqueen
item.description:
@swordqueen wrote:

What's Your Fetish !500×669 21.3 KB

For the first 24 hours, please only sign up if you joined the Gauntlet Community in the last 6 months, or if you’ve had a hard time getting into games.

Please only sign up for this game if you’re interested in playtesting a game in development!

The Allied Powers carved up Austria after the Second World War. Now the storied city of Vienna is officially divided into zones administered by the Soviets, the Americans, the French, and the British. But the true lines of the city run deeper, written in magic and blood. You know what strange things lurk in the city’s shadows—because you’re one of them.

You are freelance operatives in a city marked by war and division. You are secret supernatural beings in a world of danger and espionage. You are spies in Cold War Vienna, and this is a story of you pulling off high-stakes missions and juggling conflicting loyalties.

CW: supernatural horror, post-war trauma and aftermath, romance, possible betrayal

System : Checkpoint Midnight by Cloven Pine Games! Powered by the Apocalypse. Rules will be taught in play.

Duration : Four 3 hour sessions

Breaks : 2 breaks per session (5-10 mins)

Venue : GM’s Zoom

Recording : Yes, but only if all players consent to recording and publishing

Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required .

Safety : Lines & Veils, Script Change, an open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players.

Open access : Public signs up are available at 3/18/2021 10PM (Manila Time)

This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
